gksu gedit /etc/fstab
and add this line to the end: /dev/sda5    /media/Movies    fuseblk      rw,nosuid,nodev,allow_other,blksize=4096,default_permissions
save, unmount it from type desktop and then in a terminal type: sudo mount -a
